examples.content:
According to Reuters, the company's investment in European financial institutions have been greatly devalued hybrid securities.
据路透社报道，该公司投资的欧洲金融机构混合证券已大大贬值。

This was rejected because the green countries rightfully said they did not want their hard-earned dollars to be devalued.
这被拒绝了，因为绿色国家正面提出他们不希望自己辛苦得到的美金被贬值。
